Title: Mizumono
Plot: Hannibal prepares for his imminent departure with, he believes, Will. Will prepares for a departure of another sort, tying up loose ends, not sure if he?ll survive the trap he?s set for Hannibal. Both men feel that Jack deserves the truth, but what is that truth? Loyalties will be tested and forgiveness will be asked? and the inevitable battle between Hannibal and Jack is upon them.
GuestStars: Cynthia Nixon, Gina Torres, Lara Jean Chorostecki
